apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this emoji showcases a loving couple, with one person identified as a man of medium-dark skin tone, united by a prominent, glowing red heart. Apple's characteristic glossy 3D shading and realistic lighting give the figures a warm, approachable feel and a tangible presence.  The soft, rounded edges of the design enhance the overall sense of tenderness and affection, perfect for expressing romantic feelings or deep admiration in messages on Apple devices.
